# Node Score API

Dockerized API for high scores.

## Commands

* `./run.sh` — run or initial build.
* `./stop.sh` — stop.
* `./build.sh` — update build.

## Yarn commands

Available commands:

* `yarn start` — run app.
* `yarn lint` — list linter errors/warnings.
* `lint-and-fix` — run linter and fix errors.
* `format` — run prettier.
